title: Charleston Southern shuts out Gardner-Webb 34-0
text:
Charleston Southern shuts out Gardner-Webb 34-0 By   
BOILING SPRINGS, N.C. (AP) - Austin Brown passed for 202 yards and three touchdowns as Charleston Southern shut out Gardner-Webb 34-0 on Saturday and remained unbeaten in the Big South Conference. 
Kenny Dinkins, Mike Holloway and Ben Robinson each caught touchdown passes from Austin Brown for the Buccaneers (6-1, 3-0). Robinson also scored a 2-yard rushing TD. Solomon Brown capped the scoring with a 28-yard pick six. 
Austin Brown completed 14 of 24 passes with no interceptions as Charleston Southern won in Boiling Springs for the first time since 2005. 
Gardner-Webb (2-5, 1-2) gained 110 yards of total offense, its lowest output of the season. The Runnin’ Bulldogs gained just 46 yards passing and 64 on the ground. 
Gardner-Webb gained less than 150 yards total offense for the third time this season. 
The Buccaneers victory sets up a first-place showdown in the Big South against Coastal Carolina (7-0, 2-0) next week.
